modShortDescription: Replaces the original textures for the 1.20 version
modDescription:
Play MC3DS with textures from game version 1.20.

Release notes v0.1.8:
- Glint enchanted item
- Armor all variants
- Entity boat all variations
- Entity cat all variations (includes ocelots)
- Entity ender chest

Release Notes v0.1.9:
- Fixed in-game waterlily texture
- Fixed inventory leather armors texture

Release notes v0.2.0: Mobs update
- Most of the textures for mobs have been ported

Release notes v0.2.1
- Fixed wolf tamed texture

Credits to WaterMelon for the map Debug Mode 3D used in screenshots.
